author: Bill Gates
quote: Today, you always know whether you are on the Internet or on your PC's hard drive. Tomorrow, you will not care and may not even know.

author: Bill Gates
quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.

author: Aristotle
quote: The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.

author: Aristotle
quote: Youth is easily deceived because it is quick to hope.

author: Aristotle
quote: The secret to humor is surprise.

author: Aristotle
quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.

author: Aristotle
quote: The educated differ from the uneducated as much as the living from the dead.

author: Steve Martin
quote: The greatest thing you can do is surprise yourself.

author: Steve Martin
quote: Talking about music is like dancing about architecture.

author: Steve Martin
quote: First the doctor told me the good news: I was going to have a disease named after me.

author: Steven Wright
quote: What's another word for thesaurus?

author: Steven Wright
quote: I have an existential map; it has 'you are here' written all over it.

author: Steven Wright
quote: I have a hobby...I have the world's largest collection of sea shells. I keep it scattered on beaches all over the world. Maybe you've seen some of it...

author: Steven Wright
quote: I hate it when my leg falls sleep in the middle of the day, because that means it'll be up all night.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: Not only does God play dice, but he sometimes throws them where they cannot be seen.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: We are just an advanced breed of monkeys on a minor planet of a very average star. But we can understand the Universe. That makes us something very special.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: My goal is simple. It is a complete understanding of the universe, why it is as it is and why it exists at all.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Every book is a kid's book, if the kid can read.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I recently took up ice sculpting. Last night I made an ice cube. This morning I made 12, I was prolific.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: When someone hands you a flyer, it's like they are saying - Here. You throw this away.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I haven't slept for ten days, because that would be too long.

author: Steve Wozniak
quote: My goal wasn't to make a ton of money, it was to build good computers.

author: Steve Wozniak
quote: All the best people in life seem to like LINUX.

author: Steve Carell
quote: Children are very smart, in their own stupid way. A child's brain is like a sponge, and you know how smart sponges are.

author: Stephen King
quote: People think that I must be a very strange person. This is not correct. I have the heart of a small boy. It is in a glass jar on my desk.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something that you can succeed at.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: We are all now connected by the internet, like neurons in a giant brain.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: Success in creating AI would be the biggest event in human history. Unfortunately, it might also be the last, unless we learn how to avoid the risks.

author: Stephen Fry
quote: Old Professors never die, they just lose their faculties.

author: Stephen Fry
quote: An original idea. That can't be too hard. The library must be full of them.

author: Stephen Sondheim
quote: Math and music are intimately related. Not necessarily on a conscious level, but sure.

author: Steve Irwin
quote: So fear helps me from making mistakes, but I make lot of mistakes.

author: Steve Irwin
quote: Crikey means gee whiz, wow!

author: Steve Irwin
quote: Yeah, I'm a thrill seeker, but crikey, education's the most important thing.

author: Stephen Seagal
quote: I have no fear of death. More important, I don't fear life.

author: Steven Speilberg
quote: All of us every single year, we're a different person. I don't think we're the same person all our lives.

author: Steven Speilberg
quote: Even though I get older, what I do never gets old, and that's what I think keeps me hungry.

author: Steven Speilberg
quote: I had a great time creating the future on 'Minority Report,' and it's a future that is coming true faster than any of us thought it would.
